Nightlight::

"He tried to kill you once"said Nightlight"If he find out that you're 
alive... I don't like imagine what might happen..."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>        He frowns in contemplation.  "I'm not sure what we'll do 
then.  But I 
> think we should find a new base, somewhere hidden away from 
everyone else.  
> Then the rest of the Taurusoids and I will go track down 
Chaostaur.  If we 
> can reprogram him, we'll have our own gestalt to defend us."
